## goreasoner run

Run forward reasoning on RDF data

### Synopsis

Run forward reasoning on RDF data, applying RDFS/OWL inference rules to derive new facts from TBox and ABox.

```
goreasoner run [aboxPath] [tboxPath] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                help for run
  -o, --output string       Output path for the N-Triples file
      --outputType string   Output format: 'ntriple' or 'datalog' (default: ntriple) (default "ntriple")
```
